title: The Earl
description: In The Earl I have brought the twin passions of gin and tea together and serve them chilled in a teapot.

show.b073qz82: Good Food Friday with Michel Roux Jr and Olly Smith

For the cocktail: 30ml/1fl oz regular gin (not the infused gin)

steps: Infuse the loose leaf Earl Grey tea into the bottle of gin, shake and leave for exactly 2 hours. Strain and return to the bottle (you will not need all the gin).
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add the Earl Grey infused gin, standard gin, lemon juice, elderflower cordial, sugar syrup and lime marmalade. Shake.
Strain into a teapot packed with ice and serve chilled in teacups with a slice of fresh lemon. You could serve with ice cubes instead of sugar cubes on the side.
